00022 ultimix.RecordSelected = function( Name , ErrorMessage )
00023 {
00024       return( ultimix.RecordSelectedEx( '._' + Name + '_item_checkbox' , ErrorMessage ) );
00025 }

00038 ultimix.RecordSelectedEx = function( Selector , ErrorMessage )
00039 {
00040       var         Items = jQuery( Selector );
00041       
00042       for( i = 0 ; i < Items.length ; i++ )
00043       {
00044             if( Items[ i ].checked )
00045             {
00046                   return( true );
00047             }
00048       }
00049       
00050       if( ErrorMessage )
00051       {
00052             ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( ultimix.get_string( ErrorMessage ) , ultimix.get_string( 'Error' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_OK | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONERROR | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL );
00053       }
00054       
00055       return( false );
00056 }

00067 ultimix.GetIdentificators = function( Name )
00068 {
00069       return( ultimix.GetIdentificatorsEx( '._' + Name + '_item_checkbox' ) );

00081 ultimix.GetIdentificatorsEx = function( Selector )
00082 {
00083       var         Identificators = new Array();
00084       
00085       var         Items = jQuery( Selector );
00086       
00087       for( var i = 0 ; i < Items.length ; i++ )
00088       {
00089             if( Items[ i ].checked )
00090             {
00091                   Identificators.push( ( new String( jQuery( Items[ i ] ).attr( 'id' ) ) ).replace( '_id_' , '' ) );
00092             }
00093       }
00094       
00095       return( Identificators );
00096 }

00105 ultimix.ToggleChildrenCheckboxes = function( Checkbox )
00106 {
00107       var               ChildrenSelector = jQuery( Checkbox ).attr( 'children_selector' );
00108       
00109       var               Checked = jQuery( Checkbox ).attr( 'checked' );
00110       
00111       jQuery( ChildrenSelector ).each(
00112             function()
00113             {
00114                   jQuery( this ).attr( 'checked' , Checked );
00115                   
00116                   /* if has children */
00117                   if( jQuery( this ).attr( 'children_selector' ) )
00118                   {
00119                         /* ... then toggle children */
00120                         ultimix.ToggleChildrenCheckboxes( this );
00121                   }
00122             }
00123       );
00124 }
00125 
00133 ultimix.TryToggleParentCheckbox = function( Checkbox )
00134 {
00135       var               ParentSelector = jQuery( Checkbox ).attr( 'parent_selector' );
00136       
00137       /* if has parent */
00138       if( ParentSelector )
00139       {
00140             /* ... then try to toggle it */
00141             var               Checked = jQuery( Checkbox ).attr( 'checked' );
00142             
00143             if( Checked )
00144             {
00145                   var               SiblingsSelector = jQuery( Checkbox ).attr( 'siblings_selector' );
00146                   if( jQuery( SiblingsSelector ).length == jQuery( SiblingsSelector ).filter( ':checked' ).length )
00147                   {
00148                         jQuery( ParentSelector ).each(
00149                               function()
00150                               {
00151                                     jQuery( this ).attr( 'checked' , Checked );
00152                                     ultimix.TryToggleParentCheckbox( this );
00153                               }
00154                         );
00155                   }
00156             }
00157             else
00158             {
00159                   jQuery( ParentSelector ).each(
00160                         function()
00161                         {
00162                               jQuery( this ).attr( 'checked' , Checked );
00163                               ultimix.TryToggleParentCheckbox( this );
00164                         }
00165                   );
00166             }
00167       }
00168 }

00177 ultimix.ProcessLinkedCheckboxes = function( Checkbox )
00178 {
00179       ultimix.ToggleChildrenCheckboxes( Checkbox );
00180       ultimix.TryToggleParentCheckbox( Checkbox );
00181 }
